wikipedia_page.main: David Francis Kessler, OBE, (6 June 1906 - 24 November 1999) was a British publisher and author. He was the managing director of The Jewish Chronicle.

response: * David Kessler (writer) (born 1959), death and grieving expert
* David Kessler, character in An American Werewolf in London
He was also a Trustee of Jewish Care, and Chair of the Jewish Museum 1989-92. He supported David Kessler and the Kessler Foundation in reviewing the history of the Jewish Chronicle.
